name: 王振興
objective: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
schedule:
Week 1: Number systems & codes
Week 2: Conversions between bases
Week 3: Fundamental theorems of Boolean algebra
Week 4: Logical element realization
Week 5: Manipulation of Boolean expressions
Week 6: Algorithms for optimization of combinational logic
Week 7: Variable-entered map & tabulation method
Week 8: VLSI realizations of combinational logic
Week 9: Midterm Examination
Week10: Tree network & negative gate realization
Week11: Multilevel logic using complex parts
Week12: Components of sequential logic
Week14: Flip-flop conversions & charge sharing
Week15: Analysis of sequential logic
Week16: Synthesis of clock-mode sequential logic
Week17: Simplification by implication table
Week18: Final examination
Week19: Grading
materials:
Computer aided ligical design with emphasis on VLSI
Fourth edition
Frederick J Hill & Gerald Peterson
John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
